text: I think I have to begin with the report
that has just come out from
international prosecutors concerning
flight mh17 the Malaysian airliner that
was shot down over eastern Ukraine they
are quite clear they say the evidence
points to a missile that was made in
Russia that was brought into eastern
Ukraine from Russia and a missile
launcher that which then returned to
Russia do you accept that well first of
all we have to admit that this is a
preliminary results we understand from
the statements that were made today that
the investigation will continue till
2018 so we still have to wait until the
final verdict there are still lots of
unclear things there are still lots of
contradictions and we all have to find
answer to that contradictions from the
very beginning actually it's important
to say that we do support the idea of
overwhelming an exhaustive investigation
of their disaster and from the very
beginning Russia expressed its will to
be a full time participant on that
investigative team we do regret that
unfortunately we were refused to take
part in that investigation although
although indirectly we're still a part
of that investigative process because
we're constantly providing information
upon requests by investigative group in
the Netherlands you haven't actually
answered my question mr. Peskov I just
want to know whether you accept the
findings that we have just seen which
say that the missile which brought down
the plane came from a buk missile
launcher which was from Russia and which
then returned to Russia do you accept it
there is nothing to accept or to deny
first of all I repeat this these are
preliminary preliminary
statements and we still have to
investigate we still have to continue
investigation well with respect
team has gathered evidence for many many
months this happened more than two years
ago it has been an exhaustive
investigation they went to Moscow they
asked for help from you
your different agencies they say did not
fully cooperate but they have come up
with these conclusions you can call them
preliminary if you like but are you
denying the truth of what they say well
first of all we cannot accept as a final
truth what they say and I bet you
haven't seen any proofs of that
statements we have to be very precise
it's a very serious tragedy and we
cannot operate only statements both
statements without any proofs without
any details we know that the devil is
inside those details and unfortunately
we're still missing lots of their
details to be able and to find ourselves
in a right to say that this was in that
way and this weapon came from that part
from that direction of from this
direction see
